reviews.customers_say: Customers find this sweater well-made and versatile, noting it can be dressed up or down and looks more expensive than its price. They appreciate its soft, cozy texture that isn't scratchy, comfortable fit, and warmth that covers the chest without being bulky. The weight is perfect for chilly days, being heavy enough to retain body heat in 30 to 40 degree weather. Opinions about sizing are mixed, with some finding it

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute, comfy, and soft
items.body: Great quality. So soft and warm. Read more
items.author: Cortney Harner

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits well
items.body: Fit well, very soft. Read more
items.author: punkincake

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Returned Solidwine color which was rust color & got a small in black color
items.body: Solidwine color is more of a rusty red color than a red wine color as the picture shows. A little disappointed in that. Kind a of false advertisement wouldn't you think? Anyway, I do love how comfortable the sweater is and I'm sure I will get some wear out of it as soon as I can find anything to go with the odd "solidwine" which isn't solidwine color. If it were as it was pictured than I had several things to wear with it. Now I probably will wear black with it. You can't match it and so that makes my review a four instead of a five. ++ + + + + + UPDATE: I returned the solidwine color in Medium, my normal size that was much too large, and bought a black in Small and it is sized perfectly for me. LOVE THIS SWEATER/JACKET combination. SO SOFT and WARM. Another review of the purple/black spotted one. The print on the one I got was not well placed and the bad spots which were thin lines were on opposite sides right in the middle in the front on top and right were anyone could tell it was really awfully printed upon. Hmm.Mass printing of clothing? Probably great sometimes and not so great otherwise. Read more
items.author: ArrowHome

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful well fitting lightweight cardigan to dress up or down
items.body: I fell in love with this cardigan the first time I saw it on Amazon, and it‚Äôs still one of my favorite clothing purchases and quickly became my go-to-item. So much so that after buying the first one I got two identical cardigans in different colors. They all exceeded my expectations. Very comfortable for all day wear, I often get compliments and questions about where to buy them wherever I go. I do wish the inside was lined or at least of the same material but maybe they were designed that way for greater durability and it isn‚Äôt noticeable. They don‚Äôt have front buttons allowing a shirt or pretty camisole to be seen underneath. I‚Äôm 5‚Äô4‚Äù 160lbs. with an average build, and wear a size large in tops and sweaters. This size large is a perfect fit. They pair great with jeans, trousers or leggings and are slightly oversized but not bulky and provide a slim smooth look. The high quality nylon-polyester material is soft, not itchy, very warm and has held it‚Äôs shape well even after multiple washings with no shrinkage, pilling or fading. They are not so heavy as to make me sweat or to have to remove when indoors. Cuffed sleeves adjust for the ideal length and add a polished look. The overall sweater length falls about 3 inches above my knees. The pockets are sturdy, roomy, easily accessible, and hold a phone or wallet securely. They arrived shrink wrapped and very wrinkled, but most wrinkles disappeared after washing. There was no noticeable odor. The price of $22.38 on an Amazon limited time deal at 48% off offered an exceptional value. These sweaters often go on sale in certain colors, offering better deals. Each item was exactly as described, and the colors were as pictured. They arrived promptly, securely packaged and undamaged. Highly recommended although I did remove one star for the shrink wrap packaging. Read more
items.author: Eva Huet

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great material and quality
items.body: Great quality! Very comfortable üòå Read more
items.author: Beverly Olivia

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars MY NEW FAVVV
items.body: I searched FOREVER on here to find a soft & comfy cardigan that was slightly oversized but not too chunky & weighted, kept me warm cuz my office is FREEZING but was still breathable. When I tell you somehow this single sweater checks ALL THE BOXES. I‚Äôm not kidding! It‚Äôs so soft, no scratchy or weird material (I have terrible sensory issues ESPECIALLY with clothes) it gives that grungy academia aesthetic without feeling bulky or making you look 10x larger than you actually are if you‚Äôre an odd shape like me lol. I am typically a medium/large in women/junior size tops/sweaters. I am 5‚Äô4. 150lbs Short torso, long legs. I got this in a medium and I‚Äôm glad I did! I think a large would have been wider and bulkier at the shoulders, not necessarily longer. The medium fits my body with just the right amount of oversizing, without looking homeless haha. And in terms of length it falls just past my bum: kind of where a super short mini skirt would fall. So it could definitely be worn with leggings. Also it has pockets, and they are surprisingly large & durable . When I‚Äôm at work I can run to the bathroom without having to take my entire bag. everything I need: a larger model iphone/keys/chapstick etc fits perfectly & discreetly. If you‚Äôve been looking endlessly. Stop here and add to cart!! Read more
items.author: ZZ Skye

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars so cute and comfy
items.body: love it! love this brand. second one I purchased! Read more
items.author: Bobette

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Wrong order multiple times, sweater is soft but color I ordered never came
items.body: I had a very strange experience with this sweater. First let me say that this sweater is soft beyond belief. It's amazing! It came vacuum sealed so it was super wrinkled. I washed it and laid it out to dry and it's still a little wrinkled. I ordered the color "A-White" which is pictured as a sweater in white with black spots. I received it in color white with grey spots. I ordered an exchange thinking someone just grabbed the wrong color, but I got the same color again. I got on a chat with Amazon and they said they could give me a refund. I stated I didn't want a refund, I just want the correct sweater. They told me no problem, they will send it and not to worry - it will be correct this time. 3rd time I got the wrong sweater again! So the next time I called Amazon. Again, they said they would give me a refund. Again I said I wanted the correct sweater. They said they could do that and I asked how they know it will be correct this time. They said, "trust me." Ug! 4th time, still the wrong sweater. I contacted the seller and they replied stating that they could give me a partial refund and I could keep the sweater, no mention of whether they have the correct color or what. So I pushed back and they replied telling me that there is a variance in the color. There is a significant and obvious difference between light/medium grey and black and they tell me there is a variance? Ug. I did keep the sweater. The fit is nice and as I said, the softness alone is impressive. Good luck to you if you decide to place an order. I hope you get the correct item the first time! Read more
items.author: Julie

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: A White, A Khaki, A Beige, A Black, A Dark Grey, Dustyblue, Orange, Armygreen, Olive, Pink, Red Plaid, Solid Beige, Black Plaid. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
